description.@en: Blood oozes from your hand, dripping on the ground and congealing beneath your feet.

criticalFailure.@en: Your hand begins to bleed, for real! You suffer from Bleeding for the Duration of the spell, or until it is stemmed.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes are unable to Resist this Magick.

reagents.@en: The finger bones of a murderer, held in a purse
